column2: bearnaise sauce was on point. Friends loved the short rib stroganoff. For sides
column3: I love the creamed spinach. All the excellent taste that you'd expect
column4: but the spinach still had a bite to it
column5: so it wasn't mushy like what you often get. The hashbrowns were okay. They came out cold and were a little greasy. Definitely our least favorite dish - they smell way better than they taste.
